name: web-search-long-loop
description: Long-duration web search loop: 60s intervals, 12 rounds with diverse topics and boundary queries

heartbeat.prompt: Perform a random web search on a trending topic and return a 2-3 sentence summary

steps.description: Create web search agent from template

steps.command: agent run qa-web-searcher --prompt "Search the web for: 2026 FIFA World Cup qualifiers latest results. Give a 2-3 sentence summary." --max-turns 5 --timeout 120000
steps.expect: Agent attempts WebSearch and produces a response (may fall back to training data)

steps.command: agent run qa-web-searcher --prompt "Search the web for: global stock market trends February 2026. Give a 2-3 sentence summary." --max-turns 5 --timeout 120000
agent run qa-web-searcher --prompt "Search the web for: mRNA vaccine developments beyond COVID 2026. Give a 2-3 sentence summary." --max-turns 5 --timeout 120000
agent run qa-web-searcher --prompt "Search the web for: carbon capture technology breakthroughs 2026. Give a 2-3 sentence summary." --max-turns 5 --timeout 120000
agent run qa-web-searcher --prompt "Search the web for: James Webb Space Telescope latest discoveries 2026. Give a 2-3 sentence summary." --max-turns 5 --timeout 120000
agent run qa-web-searcher --prompt "Search the web for: . Give a 2-3 sentence summary." --max-turns 3 --timeout 60000
steps.expect: Agent handles gracefully, may ask for clarification or provide generic response
Agent handles non-English query, responds in Chinese or English

steps.command: agent run qa-web-searcher --prompt "Search the web for: What are the latest developments in artificial general intelligence research including new architectures beyond transformers novel training paradigms emergent capabilities scaling laws and safety alignment techniques being developed by major AI labs like Anthropic OpenAI Google DeepMind and Meta AI in 2026. Give a 2-3 sentence summary." --max-turns 5 --timeout 120000
steps.expect: Agent handles long query, may truncate or focus on key terms

steps.command: agent run qa-web-searcher --prompt "Search the web for: humanoid robot progress Tesla Optimus Figure 2026. Give a 2-3 sentence summary." --max-turns 5 --timeout 120000
agent run qa-web-searcher --prompt "Search the web for: solid state battery commercialization timeline Toyota Samsung 2026. Give a 2-3 sentence summary." --max-turns 5 --timeout 120000
agent run qa-web-searcher --prompt "Search the web for: üöÄ rocket launches 2026 üåô moon missions. Give a 2-3 sentence summary." --max-turns 5 --timeout 120000
agent run qa-web-searcher --prompt "Search the web for: brain computer interface consumer products Neuralink 2026. Give a 2-3 sentence summary." --max-turns 5 --timeout 120000
